definition: lit. to draw a line on the ground to keep within (idiom)/fig. to impose restrictions on oneself
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: I have the ability to overcome all of obstacles and give all my heart to serve this world.
sentences.chinese: 開放自己的心不畫地自限就能飛得更遠。
